description: A little heist on the go perhaps? Cyber Knights: Flashpoint from Trese Brothers is steadily turning into a favourite turn-based tactics game and now with all the controller improvements it should feel a whole lot better on Steam Deck too.
title: Cyber Knights: Flashpoint adds full gamepad support and Steam Deck improvements

description: From game devs to movies and all sorts, Blender is a truly incredible bit of free and open source tech and it has evolved a lot with Blender 4.2 out now.
title: Blender 4.2 is another crazy-big release

description: Ah hell, here we go again. Hello Games just released another massive free update to No Man's Sky with Worlds Part I out now.
title: No Man's Sky - Worlds Part I is out now and drastically transforms the planets

description: Jackbox Games are soon to release The Jackbox Megapicker, which is basically a launcher that shows all their games so you won't need to keep switching between packs for all their different games.
title: Get a Drawful 2 free with The Jackbox Megapicker for the first 30 days after release

description: If you're in need of a fresh set of games, you may want to hop over to Fanatical's Bundle Bash as they're putting out a new bundle every day this week.
title: Fanatical's Bundle Bash has new game bundles every day this week

description: After initially releasing on Steam as Enlisted: Reinforced back in March, it was quickly taken down but now it's back on Steam just as Enlisted.
title: Enlisted from Gaijin and Darkflow returns to Steam and now free to play

description: TheForceEngine is an open source modern "Jedi Engine" replacement supporting Dark Forces, mods, and in the future Outlaws. A new release version 1.10.000 just rolled out.
title: TheForceEngine adds initial Dark Forces Remaster support

description: Need more retro shooting goodness in your life? How about a little more from Quake 1? The Immortal Lock is a brand new pack from modder ComfyByTheFire that's well worth a look.
title: Check out The Immortal Lock, an impressive new Quake 1 mod

description: Valve released multiple updates just recently including a Stable Steam Client update for all and another Beta release with fixes for Desktop and Steam Deck.
title: Steam stable update released, and a Beta with lots of fixes for Desktop and Steam Deck
